mapper.insert: insert into ecs_feedback (msg_id, parent_id, user_id, user_name, user_email, msg_title, msg_type, msg_status, msg_time, message_img, order_id, msg_area, msg_content) values (#{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{msgStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{msgTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{messageImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgArea,jdbcType=BIT}, #{msgContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
